import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update ticket assets by category"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/assets/{wizardCategoryId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the assets linked to a ticket, filtering by wizard category. This endpoint is useful when working with ticket wizards that categorize assets during submission.

**Behavior**
- Assets are filtered by the specified wizard category before update
- The provided list replaces existing assets in that category
- Other assets outside the category are not affected

**Use Cases**
- Updating device assignments during multi-step ticket wizards
- Replacing assets within a specific category without affecting others

**Prerequisites**
- Obtain ticket ID via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets)
- Obtain wizard category ID from the ticket creation wizard configuration

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the ticket to update","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890"},{"name":"wizardCategoryId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"UUID of the wizard category to filter assets by","example":"36c6be98-4f39-e611-bf3b-005056bb000e"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"List of assets to associate with the ticket within the specified category","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","description":"Complete list of assets that should remain linked to the ticket. The service will remove any existing assets not present in this collection, and will insert or update the supplied entries.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Asset entry to attach to a ticket. Provide either a specific `AssetId` or a placeholder pairing of `ModelId` and `CategoryId` when the exact device is not yet known. Existing links can be retained or removed by including their `TicketAssetId`.","properties":{"TicketAssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Existing ticket asset identifier. Include to retain or update a previously attached asset; omit to add a new link.","example":"1f6f9c46-4d23-4db0-8df0-2c53b5b2c2e1"},"AssetId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the asset to attach to the ticket.","example":"42f8cc6d-0efd-4a68-983b-be61e9e1c49c"},"ModelId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset model identifier used when linking a model placeholder instead of a specific asset.","example":"d20688ee-81f3-42f8-a0f3-2324e4e95e68"},"CategoryId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Asset category identifier required when linking by model without an `AssetId`.","example":"36c6be98-4f39-e611-bf3b-005056bb000e"}},"anyOf":[{"required":["AssetId"]},{"required":["ModelId"]},{"required":["CategoryId"]}],"title":"TicketAssetUpdateItem"},"example":[{"AssetId":"4112aa9a-db65-4e49-ad67-a5423010b344"}],"title":"UpdateTicketAssetsRequest"},"example":[{"AssetId":"42f8cc6d-0efd-4a68-983b-be61e9e1c49c"}]}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
